history.action: First reading, referred to Community Safety.
Public hearing in the House Committee on Community Safety at 1:30 PM.
Executive action taken in the House Committee on Community Safety at 8:00 AM.
CS - Majority; do pass.
Minority; do not pass.
Referred to Rules 2 Review.
Committee relieved of further consideration.
Referred to Appropriations.
Public hearing in the House Committee on Appropriations at 1:30 PM.
Executive action taken in the House Committee on Appropriations at 9:00 AM.
APP - Majority; 1st substitute bill be substituted, do pass.
Minority; do not pass.
Referred to Rules 2 Review.

votes.desc: House Committee on Community Safety: do pass
